class.name: CSharpScriptCustomBuildStep
class.description: A build step running a C# script with the specified content

function.name: csharpScript
function.description: Adds a build step running a C# script with the specified content @see CSharpCustomScriptBuildStep

param.name: teamcity.build.workingDir
param.description: [Build working directory](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Build+Working+Directory) for the script, specify it if it is different from the [checkout directory](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Build+Checkout+Directory).

param.name: scriptContent
param.description: Content of the script to run

param.name: scriptArgs
param.description: Space-separated list of additional arguments for C# script

param.name: nuget.packageSources
param.description: Space-separated list of NuGet package source (URL, UNC/folder path)
